mapper.sql: id, name, worker_id as workerId, worker_name as workerName, house_id as houseId, money, state, defined_worker_id as definedWorkerId, defined_name as definedName, have_money as haveMoney, house_worker_order_id as houseWorkerOrderId, apply_money as applyMoney, wallet_money as walletMoney, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate
mapper.select: select sum(money) from dj_worker_worker_detail where worker_id=#{workerId} and (state=0 or state=2)

select
from dj_worker_worker_detail where worker_id=#{workerId} and (state=0 or state=2) ORDER BY create_date DESC
select sum(money) from dj_worker_worker_detail where worker_id=#{workerId} and (state=1 or state=3)

select
from dj_worker_worker_detail where worker_id=#{workerId} and (state=1 or state=3) ORDER BY create_date DESC
select sum(wd.money) from dj_worker_worker_detail as wd where wd.state=0 and wd.worker_id=#{workerId}

select DATE_FORMAT(d.create_date, '%Y-%m') month from dj_worker_worker_detail as d where d.worker_id=#{workerId} and DATE_FORMAT(d.create_date, '%Y-%m') > DATE_FORMAT( date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 12 month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY month ORDER BY d.create_date DESC
